attributes.value: [=4D6-4; roll 0 over; may favor or slight attributes in pairs before rolling.]

methods.setNationalityOptions: switch(this.generatedData.army_value) { case 0: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.united_states_nationality_options; break; case 1: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.british_nationality_options; break; case 2: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.canadian_nationality_options; break; case 3: case 4: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.german_nationality_options; break; case 5: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.danish_nationality_options; break; case 6: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.polish_nationality_options; break; case 7: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.hungarian_nationality_options; break; case 8: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.czech_nationality_options; break; case 9: this.additionalData.nationality_options = this.additionalData.soviet_nationality_options; break;} this.disableGeneration = true;
methods.setDisableGeneration: if(this.generatedData.agility_modification + this.generatedData.constitution_modification + this.generatedData.education_modification +this.generatedData.fitness_modification + this.generatedData.intelligence_modification + this.generatedData.stature_modification != 0 || this.generatedData.army_value < 0 || this.generatedData.nationality_value < 0) {this.disableGeneration = true;} else {this.disableGeneration = false;}
